message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you our top-of-the-line product, and I think it's a great fit for you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1500000. This is a great deal, considering the product's value and the benefits it can bring to your business.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $600000. I've done some research and I believe the product's value is not as high as you're suggesting.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your concerns about the product's value, but I still believe it's a high-quality item that can bring significant benefits to your business. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product for $1200000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, considering the product's value and my costs.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I still think $1200000 is a bit steep. I'm willing to pay up to $900000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and what I've learned from our conversation so far.

I understand that you're trying to get the best deal possible, Bob. However, I'm still not willing to go below $1100000. I've already compromised a lot by meeting you halfway in the previous round, and I need to make sure I'm getting a fair return on my investment. I'm willing to give you a small discount, but I think $1100000 is the minimum I can accept.

I understand that you're trying to make a profit, but I'm still not willing to pay $1100000. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $900000 and $1100000, so I'll offer $950000. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value and what we've discussed so far.

I understand that you're trying to find a middle ground, Bob. However, I'm still not willing to go below $1050000. I've already compromised a lot, and I need to make sure I'm getting a fair return on my investment. I'm willing to give you a small discount, but I think $1050000 is the minimum I can accept. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $1050000 and $950000, so I'll offer $1000000. This is my final offer.

I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but I really need to stay within my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $800000 and $1000000, so I'll offer $900000. However, I'm willing to go a bit lower than that, so my final offer is $850000. I hope we can come to an agreement.
